LanguageData.LOF_Ability_Monitor.description:
洞察力自然恢复进度
 介绍:
洞察力是占星师种族拥有的独特能力,许多专属技能都依赖洞察力进行释放.
 注意:
当占星师靠近星光草附近时,洞察力恢复速度会加快.
LanguageData.LOF_Ability_IncreaseHarvest.label: 大丰收
LanguageData.LOF_Ability_IncreaseHarvest.description: 消耗一定洞察力,在一天内提高农作物收获量,屠宰量,手术成功率,制作物品高品质概率,射击命中率.\n食物消耗率x200%.
LanguageData.LOF_Ability_Teleport.label: 进行折跃
LanguageData.LOF_Ability_UnstableCatalyst.label: 进入不稳定态
LanguageData.LOF_Ability_UnstableCatalyst.description: 持续消耗洞察力可以进入不稳定态，此时有一半的几率受击不造成伤害.
LanguageData.LOF_Ability_LeechAttack.label: 吸血攻击
LanguageData.LOF_Ability_LeechAttack.description: 持续消耗洞察力,攻击敌人造成伤害时固定回复血量.
LanguageData.LOF_Ability_GravityDeflection.label: 释放引力偏转尘埃
LanguageData.LOF_Ability_GravityDeflection.descriptio: 消耗洞察力可以释放一片引力偏转尘埃,该尘埃会偏转子弹和电荷弹.
LanguageData.LOF_Ability_AnchoredStance.label: 锚定立场
LanguageData.LOF_Ability_AnchoredStance.description: 消耗洞察力创造一个让敌人闪避率为0的立场.
LanguageData.LOF_Ability_EmergencyRescue.label: 紧急救援
LanguageData.LOF_Ability_PhotonBomb.label: 释放光子炸弹
LanguageData.LOF_Ability_PhotonBomb.description: 可以跨墙释放的光子炸弹
LanguageData.LOF_Ability_Gravitational.label: 创造引力点
LanguageData.LOF_Ability_Gravitational.description: 创造一个引力点将敌人拉向该引力点
LanguageData.LOF_Ability_DeployEMP.label: 部署EMP冲击背包
LanguageData.LOF_Ability_DeployEMP.description: 部署可以定期产生EMP冲击波的背包.
LanguageData.LOF_Ability_Skip.label: 进行大跳
LanguageData.LOF_Ability_Coagulate.label: 紧急止血
LanguageData.LOF_Ability_ReloadFromThing.label: 重新装填
